title: How do I check the OPV status in Patient Details?
body:
Follow these steps check the OPV status in Patient Details:
Open the patient record
Make sure you are in the Details tab
Click Settings
Navigate to the "i" icon next to the OPV button
Hover your mouse over the icon
When the cursor changes into a Finger Pointer, the details of the last OPV results will pop-out next to the icon
The results will display whether the OPV check was Completed or if it Failed (see example images below)

The OPV status check is now complete.
